item.title: Generating Harmony using Context-Free Grammar
item.description: Background In this post, I explain an exciting framework used to analyze and generate sequences of chords in musical pieces. Before diving into the main part, I provide a brief introduction of the necessary concepts in music and harmony theory. Music Theory - Chords and Scale Degrees Playing the piano has always been one of my greatest passions. After playing classical music for several years, I fell in love with improvisation as well as playing songs in different arrangements and styles.
